fno: In the cash market, the Nifty 50 added 6.25 points or 0.03% to settle at 19,434.55. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, rallied 4.10% to 12. Reliance Industries, HDFC Bank and Adani Ports and Special Economic Zone were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The August 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 31 August 2023.
